metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44718 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: wolfSSL through 5.0.0 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service and infinite loop in the client component by sending crafted traffic from a Machine-in-the-Middle (MITM) position. The root cause is that the client module accepts TLS messages that normally are only sent to TLS servers.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
